label: Komai, Tomoyuki.  2015. Reinstatement and redescription of Lebbeus armatus (Owen, 1839),  long synonymized with L. groenlandicus (Fabricius, 1775), and description  of one new species from the southwestern Sea of Okhotsk, Hokkaido, Japan  (Crustacea: Decapoda: Caridea: Thoridae). Zootaxa 3905(4): 451–473.
value: Komai, Tomoyuki.  2015. title: Reinstatement and redescription of Lebbeus armatus (Owen, 1839), long synonymized with L. groenlandicus (Fabricius, 1775), and description of one new species from the southwestern Sea of Okhotsk, Hokkaido, Japan (Crustacea: Decapoda: Caridea: Thoridae)
